name: AWS Elastic Container Service: Fargate
description: Monitor the observability of [AWS Elastic Container Service](https://aws.amazon.com/ecs/).

METRIST_AWS_LB_DNS_NAME.description: A load balancer DNS name to ping.
METRIST_AWS_LB_DNS_NAME.required: Ues, if PingService step is configured.

METRIST_AWS_LB_TARGET_GROUP_ARN.description: The load balancer target group ARN to access from the load balancer.

METRIST_AWS_TASK_DEFINITION_ARN.description: Full ARN of the task definition to run in your service.

METRIST_CLUSTER_ID.description: ID of the cluster hosted by Amazon ECS.

METRIST_SECURITY_GROUP_ID.description: A security group ID relevant to this cluster.

METRIST_VPC_PUBLIC_SUBNETS.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of the subnets associated with the service.
